function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of different sensor types and buses may introduce compatibility issues and data inconsistencies.","Impact":"Inaccurate environmental data collection and analysis.","Mitigation":"Standardize sensor types and buses, implement data validation and error-checking algorithms.","Technologies":"Sensor data validation algorithms, error-checking protocols.","People":"Researchers, engineers, data analysts.","Owner":"Research team, engineering team."},{"Description":"Higher cost of certain sensors may limit widespread deployment, reducing coverage and accuracy of environmental monitoring.","Impact":"Limited monitoring coverage, potential inaccuracies in data analysis.","Mitigation":"Explore cost-effective alternatives, seek funding for equipment, prioritize sensor deployment based on critical monitoring areas.","Technologies":"Cost-effective sensor alternatives, fundraising techniques, deployment prioritization algorithms.","People":"Funding organizations, project managers, research team.","Owner":"Funding organizations, project managers."},{"Description":"Manufacturing cost and process may limit scalability and affordability of the monitoring system.","Impact":"Inaccessible monitoring technology for larger-scale implementation, high production costs.","Mitigation":"Optimize manufacturing process for cost reduction, explore alternative production methods, seek partnerships for mass production.","Technologies":"Cost-effective manufacturing processes, production optimization techniques, mass production partnerships.","People":"Manufacturers, production engineers, project managers.","Owner":"Manufacturers, project managers."}]}
